sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
c.studentId,
s.studentName,
s.stream,
s.marks, 
s.createDate,
s.updateDate,
    c.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 
c.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION,  
    c.SYS_CHANGE_COLUMNS
FROM Student AS s 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(
CHANGES Student, @{activity('lkupLastChngTrackVer').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as c 
ON s.[studentId] = c.[studentId] 
where c.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= 
@{activity('lkupCurChngTrackVer').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

sources.name: DelimitedText3

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
